CSSPageRule.summary: CSSPageRule represents a single CSS @page rule.

CSSPageRuleSelectorText.summary: The selectorText property of the interface gets and sets the selectors associated with the CSSPageRule.

CSSPageRuleStyle.summary: The read-only style property of the interface contains a object representing the descriptors available in the {{cssxref("@page")}} rule's body.
CSSPageRuleStyle.value:
A object.
NOTEEarlier versions of the specification defined this property as a .
Check the compatibility data below for your browser.Although the style property itself is read-only in the sense that you can't replace the CSSPageDescriptors object, you can still assign to the style property directly, which is equivalent to assigning to its property. You can also modify the CSSPageDescriptors object using the and methods.
